% define auxiliary command for tex source generated by pandoc
\providecommand{\tightlist}{%
  \setlength{\itemsep}{0pt}\setlength{\parskip}{0pt}}
  
% reduce font size in long tables
\BeforeBeginEnvironment{longtable}{\begin{table}[h]\scriptsize}
\AfterEndEnvironment{longtable}{\end{table}}

% suppress subsections in table of contents
\addtocontents{toc}{\setcounter{tocdepth}{1}}

In this chapter we describe several tutorial files that demonstrate various features of Flow123d.
The tutorial files are placed in \texttt{tests/05\_tutorial}.

\input 01_column.tex
\input 02_column_transport.tex
\input 03_tunnel.tex
\input 04_frac_diffusion.tex
\input 05_frac_sorption.tex
\input 06_frac_dualpor.tex
\input 07_heat.tex

% use normal font in long tables in the rest of document
\BeforeBeginEnvironment{longtable}{}
\AfterEndEnvironment{longtable}{}

% allow again subsections in table of contents
\addtocontents{toc}{\setcounter{tocdepth}{3}}
